document.full_text: the three retiring u.s. space shuttles will be going on display at museums in florida, california and virginia, the u.s. space agency nasa said on tuesday.
document.title: nasa sending retired space shuttles to museums
lines_and_colors: the three retiring u.s. space shuttles will be going on display at museums in florida, california and virginia, the u.s. space agency nasa said on tuesday.
